title: Morris Madden
summary: Morris DeWayne Madden (born August 31, 1960) is an American former professional baseball pitcher who played for the Detroit Tigers and the Pittsburgh Pirates of the Major League Baseball(MLB) between 1987 and 1989.
content:
Morris DeWayne Madden (born August 31, 1960) is an American former professional baseball pitcher who played for the Detroit Tigers and the Pittsburgh Pirates of the Major League Baseball(MLB) between 1987 and 1989.
